name: Un train peut en cacher un autre
name_original: Un train peut en cacher un autre
description:
This game was made during the Global Game Jam 2020.

You are playing as a switch operator in St Lazare train station during the 70s. You are managing a team of 2 mecanicians to repair railways as trains roll at full speed. Avoid collision and do not let trains derail. 

Controls

You need a gamepad to manage one of them at a time through radio with 3 orders: Move (A), Hold (B) and Turn Back (Y). 

They can only move up and down, in order to move horizontaly they will have to go back to the start platform. 

You can switch from one to another with the shoulders, they repair tracks automatically, you will just have to order them to go again once it's done.
